title: VHS Camcorder review: Shoot totally tubular “analog” videos on your iPhone, dude
text:
VHS Camcorder review: Shoot totally tubular “analog” videos on your iPhone, dude 
Published By: Macworld.com - Today 
The App Store is great for recapturing nostalgia from another time and place. Whether you’re melancholy for retro games from the Atari era...
